313792.荷物が 無造作に 積み重なっている……。\n誰かが 慌てて 置いたようだ。:
There are goods here piled haphazardly...
Seems like someone left them here in a
hurry.

317910.台座の上に 古めかしい石碑が 建っている。\n間に文字のようなものが 刻まれてい:
A weathered stone monument stands tall on a pedestal. It appears to have an inscription engraved, but it was
completely unreadable...

319641.空中に 女神像のようなものが\n浮かんでいる。\nしかし ここからでは届かないよ:
Something resembling a statue of the Goddess
floats in the air. However, it seems out of
reach from here.

319643.女神像から 光が 放たれている。: Light is emitting from the Goddess statue.

319663.眠りのフクロウが 生み出されていた\nツボらしきものがある……。\n<br>\n:
It looks to be something resembling a jar that once created the Sleeping Owls...
Now that the Owl of Eternal Sleep has been defeated, it seems to just be an ordinary jar.

320490.<pc>は 立て札を読んだ。\nしかし こちらは 裏側だった！:
You tried to read the sign.
But you're standing on the wrong side!

323445.井戸には 清らかな水が たたえられている。: The well is filled with pure water.

323446.井戸には 清らかな水が たたえられている。: The well is filled with pure water.

323657.燈火の調査隊のメンバーに向けた 掲示板だ。\n<br>\n周辺の地図や 調査の報:
It's a noticeboard for members of the Ember Explorers.
Maps of the surrounding areas and reports of explorations are posted here.

323658.はじまりの地の 周辺の地図だ。\nドゥラ院長が 作成したものらしい。\n<br>:
It's a map of the area surrounding the Land of Beginnings. It looks to have been made by Dura.
It's intentionally kept simple to understand the surrounding areas at a mere glance.

323659.燈火の調査隊の紋章が描かれた 旗だ。\n<br>\nアストルティアの大地を イメ:
It's a flag bearing the emblem of the Ember Explorers.
It seems to have been designed by Dura and the others, inspired by the vast lands of Astoltia.

To those utilizing the shortcut, be aware that strong monsters roam there. The windmill route, while longer, is a much safer detour.

↑ Statue
← Zenit, the Sacred Lake

325079.<left>←村跡地\n<right>聖湖ゼニート→:
← Village Site
→ Zenit, the Sacred Lake

325111.台座の上に 古めかしい石碑が 建っている。\n<pc>は 石碑に刻まれた文字を:
There is an ancient stone monument standing tall on a pedestal. reads its inscription.
The eyes embraced by the sacred lake serve as a guide, beckoning the chosen ones to the vast sky.
Seekers of the path, deliver your light to the eyes of the lake. If you truly are the Children of the Covenant, my servants
shall welcome you in the sky.

325112.台座の上に 古めかしい石碑が 建っている。\n<pc>は 石碑に刻まれた文字を:
There is an ancient stone monument standing tall on a pedestal. reads its inscription.
Once, a wise king ruled over this land. Yet, this era of prosperity did not last, as an evil emperor of the king's bloodline brought
suffering to the world.
The evil emperor had destroyed the wise king and his castle. However, if this evil emperor is struck down by a righteous heart, then
the sky will be as equally blue, and the wind flow just the same.
Time has erased both the name of the wise king and the deeds of the evil emperor. Only in this eternal land of Zeniath shall
the past deeds of humanity be sung.

325700.かなり古めかしい ニワトリの像のようだ……。:
It appears to be a very old statue of a
chicken...

325701.かなり古めかしい ニワトリの像のようだ……。:
It appears to be a very old statue of a
chicken...

325827.りっぱな像のようだが\n すっかり こわれてしまっている……。:
It's a very nice looking statue that is
unfortunately completely broken...

328334.返事がない。\nただの 人形のようだ……。:
There's no reply.
It's just a doll...

328722.台座の上に 古めかしい石碑が 建っている。\n<pc>は 石碑に刻まれた文字を:
There is an ancient stone monument standing tall on a pedestal. reads its inscription.
Once guided by the incarnation of a sacred dragon and a fairy, a lone angel became human, saving the cursed souls of the
world and protecting Zeniath...
Though not a god, this angel trained themselves, honed their wisdom, and assisted their companions, achieving
feats that surpassed even the gods.
Thus, I have come to the conclusion that no matter what happens, humans must not be destroyed...
All living beings... All created lives... They harbor fragments of light. That it what I choose to believe...

328857.ルーミリアの作った 浄化の聖花石だ。\n<br>\n石には 一点の曇りも 見られ:
It's the Purifying Flowerstone that Lumeria had created.
The stone shows not a single speck of any cloudiness. It appears to be functioning properly.
